sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import {Header} from '../components/Header' import ContactsServices from '../Firebase/services' import { collection, query, where } from 'firebase/firestore'; import { db } from '../Firebase/firebase' import { UserAuth } from '../context/AuthContext'; const contactsCollection = collection(db,'contacts') export default function ContactView() { const [contactData, setContactData] = useState([]) const url = window.location.href const contactId = url.split("?id=")[1] const {user, logout} = UserAuth(); const userID = user.uid useEffect(()=>{ getContact(); },[]) const getContact = async ()=>{ const data = await ContactsServices.getSingleDoc('wga1Csj8ZtJmhVDW2wXO'); setContactData(data.data()) } console.log(contactData) return ( <>
ContactView
First Name {contactData.first_name} Last Name {contactData.last_name} Email {contactData.email} Phone Main {contactData.phone_number01} Phone Secondary {contactData.phone_number02}
) }
